20110128171429.000|20110128171432.000|CC1|    on the wings of Lunesta.    
20110128171432.000|20110128171432.000|CC1|  Lunesta helps you fall asleep 
20110128171432.000|20110128171435.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20110128171435.000|20110128171435.000|CC1|           so you can           
20110128171435.000|20110128171438.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20110128171438.000|20110128171438.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20110128171438.000|20110128171441.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20110128171441.000|20110128171443.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20110128171443.000|20110128171443.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20110128171443.000|20110128171445.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20110128171445.000|20110128171445.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20110128171445.000|20110128171448.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20110128171448.000|20110128171449.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20110128171449.000|20110128171449.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20110128171449.000|20110128171452.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,

20110128171502.000|20110128171504.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal.
